data.title: Charles C. Mann
data.text:
Charles C. Mann (born 1955) is an American journalist and author, specializing in scientific topics.

Quotes

[edit]

In the age of the internet there are all too many people who are willing to tell you what to think and not nearly enough trying to report what’s going on.

"Charles Mann: ‘The relationship between population and consumption is not straightforward’", The Guardian (June 10, 2018)

There's no question that what we want today would have seemed abhorrent to most people in the 1800s.

"Charles C. Mann - Americas Before Columbus & Scientific Wizardry", Dwarkesh Podcast (September 14, 2022)

We commonly call this hemisphere the New World, but it is just as old as the Old World, and has a past that is just as fabulous.

"10 Questions with Charles Mann", Politics and Prose
